review: The great item and an excellent acquision.
author: Giovanni

review: Adore my Fire Stick. I love watching movies on my devices, but sometimes you just want it on the big screen! Super-easy set up. Remote is idiot-proof and we even take it with us on every road trip and vacation so that we can watch our Watchlist, Netflix and YouTube movies and shows.
author: L. Webster

review: The Fire stick works well, the power cord could be longer.
author: Michael Lau

review: it just like your cable box if you don't have the channel then you have to pay to get it. says its free but its not
author: James Eastep

review: Does just what I need I t to and fast. Love it!
author: Christian Nygren

review: The Fire stick is great!  We tried another system, but found the Fire stick on a daily deal and decided to try it.  So glad we did.  We use it to watch Netflix on our TV.  It starts quickly, doesn't buffer or stall during a program, and is easy to use.
author: Jeanne M
